experiences.title: Open source contributor
experiences.description: Contributed to various open source projects, including bug fixes and feature enhancements. Collaborated with maintainers and other contributors to ensure high-quality contributions and adherence to project guidelines.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer II
experiences.description:
Developed the Tags feature from scratch using PatternFly, React.js, and TypeScript.

Implemented functionalities including CRUD operations for tags, bulk tag addition and updation, tag addition and updation via file upload, and management of tag data requests.

Migrated multiple platform applications from PatternFly v4 to PatternFly v5, resulting in improved overall performance.

Removed unnecessary code and assets to reduce the overall build size and enhance application performance.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description:
Owned the frontend of the Physical Inventory module independently. Worked on revamping the module, added new features, and implemented new designs to support reopening and auto-adjustment of parts, which helped reduce full inventory time by more than 30%.

Worked on the revamp of the Parts & Inventory module for improved UI/UX and shortcut support, enabling users to add parts to inventory faster.

Refactored code by migrating old table components to newer versions to support additional features.

Added new features across multiple modules, including column configurator support, asynchronous PDF/Excel downloads, and auto-complete functionality.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description:
Carscan.ai: Added 360 image & video based inspection for different vehicles. Added support for the inspection of vehicles other than car like Truck inspection and Bike inspection. Fixed bugs, developed various POCs related to WebRTC in the web app.

LifeRamp: Worked on the development of new features and fixed bugs in the mobile app and admin dashboard of LifeRamp.

Get2Go: Developed new features and fixed bugs in the mobile and web app. Moved backend functionality to Firebase Cloud Functions for better performance and security of the app.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Worked as a Full Stack Software Engineer responsible for Backend, Data-pipeline and Frontend of the Revx team. Worked on the revamping the old Php code to the new React codebase. Developed new Spark and Hadoop jobs which helped to process the data faster &reduced the cost of data processing by 10-15%.
